PartnerRequestPage.explanation:
To qualify for a 'Partner Account' Your Account must represent a diving business that takes divers out diving. 
 Examples include: Dive Shops, Dive Charters, Diver Centres and Liveaboards
PartnerRequestPage.websiteExplainer: To evaluate and validate your business
PartnerRequestPage.latLngExplainer: To place your business on the map
PartnerRequestPage.createError: Error creating request. Please try again later.

ConfirmDeleteAccount.subHeader: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
ConfirmDeleteAccount.body: Please note that deleting your account will not delete your previous dive site or photo submissions, please contact us if you wish to have those removed from the community
